main event: The observer sighted a silvery colored object that had white revolving lights on the edges and a red light on top.
interesting points: The observer was sent a Form 117, but never returned it as of the date of the report.
The object appeared to stand still at times and suddenly speed up and/or fly away at times.
The object did not make any noise and did not interfere with radio reception.
The object was sighted on two consecutive mornings, July 6 and July 7, 1967, exhibiting similar behavior.
The object was observed to be extremely bright, like strokes of light emanating from a large ball-shaped object.
sighted object: silvery colored object with white revolving lights and a red light
